price: Nokorε sε, mmarima no bi wͻ nnipa mu a, wͻhwehwε ntwitwageε firi Jinn mmarima no mu bi hͻ, enti wͻma (nnipa no) tͻkͻso di nsεmmͻne.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna rijālun mina al-insi yaʿūdhūna birijālin mina al-jini fazādūhum rahaqan
